description: Dual bidirectional motor driver board based on the L298N IC. Supports two DC motors up to 2A each, with input voltage 3.2V~40Vdc. Includes on‑board +5V regulator, LED indicators, and protection diodes.
application_examples: Controlling two DC motors with an Arduino

getting_started.connection_guide: Connect IN1‑IN4 to Arduino digital pins, VCC to external motor supply (3.2‑40V), GND to common ground, and use the on‑board 5V output to power the Arduino if desired.

source_document: Handson Technology User Guide for SKU MDU-1049

example_code.explaination: Basic Arduino sketch to drive two DC motors using the L298N dual H‑bridge driver.
